translation.es: Se aconseja a los empleados de USRCS

translation.en: to avoid prolonged physical contact with Bad Batch inmates.
translation.es: evitar el contacto prolongado con los Defectuosos.

translation.en: - This includes eye contact. - Bad Batch 5035 to 5040.
translation.es: Esto incluye contacto visual. Defectuosos 5035 al 5040.
Se aconseja a los empleados de USRCS

translation.en: to limit eye contact with Bad Batch inmates
translation.es: limitar el contacto visual con los Defectuosos

translation.en: - to no longer than ten seconds. - Bad Batchers, once tagged,
go to the left side of the room and get your rations.
translation.es: vayan a la izquierda y reciban sus raciones.

translation.en: - USRCS employees are never - Single- file line, please.
translation.es: - Los empleados de USRCS - Una sola fila.

translation.en: - to inquire details regarding... - Come on. Let's keep it moving.
Bad Batch inmate 5040, Arlen May Johnson.
Take a seat right there, miss.
- I need your right ear, please. - USRCS employees are reminded
translation.es: Su oreja derecha. Los empleados de USRCS deben diferenciar...

translation.en: between personal view statements and view statements
translation.es: UNA PELÍCULA ORIGINAL DE NETFLIX ...entre declaraciones personales

translation.en: and positions made on behalf of the agency or association.
translation.es: y la posición de la agencia o de la asociación.

translation.en: Bad Batch 5039, you can move out.
USRCS employees are advised to avoid
translation.es: Se aconseja a los empleados de USRCS

translation.en: prolonged physical contact with Bad Batch inmates.
translation.es: evitar el contacto prolongado con los Defectuosos.

translation.en: All right, 5040. You can move out.
You want to radio it in?
It's hotter than the devil's A- hole out here.
translation.es: Hace más calor aquí que en el culo del diablo.

translation.en: Whew. Get me back to that AC.
♪ All that she wants is another baby... ♪
I can't find my fucking shoes. Where are my shoes? Hey.
translation.es: No encuentro mis malditos zapatos. NO ENTRAS AL SUEÑO  SI EL SUEÑO NO ENTRA EN TI
NO ENTRAS AL SUEÑO  SI EL SUEÑO NO ENTRA EN TI Está todo oxidado. Ni siquiera funciona.

translation.en: you have nothing to worry about.
- Keep walking. - There's one thing you must never forget.
translation.es: - Muévete. - Hay algo que no debes olvidar.

translation.en: Never, never, never, never, never, never, never, never forget this one thing.
if you forget this one thing,
and you forget this one thing, you will have done nothing in your life.
translation.es: y olvidas este detalle, no habrás hecho nada de tu vida.

translation.en: The one thing you must never forget!
- Give me some fucking noodles! - One dollar.
You don't pay, no noodle. No noodle for you, no pay.
translation.es: No pagas, no fideos. No fideos para ti.

translation.en: No one is going to tell you.
You have to figure it out for yourself.
You have to figure it out.
If you forget everything else but this one thing, you have nothing to worry about.
translation.es: Si olvidas todo, excepto esto, no tienes de qué preocuparte.

translation.en: I can't do it again. Please.
translation.es: No puedo de nuevo. Por favor.
Por favor, no haga esto. Por favor.

translation.en: Please don't do this. I can't do it again.
translation.es: Por favor, no lo haga. No puedo de nuevo.

translation.en: I can't do it. Please. God.
translation.es: No puedo hacerlo. Por favor. Dios.

translation.en: I'm not supposed to be here. Please don't do this.
translation.es: Yo no debería estar aquí. Por favor, no.

translation.en: Please, please, please, I'm begging you.
I'm begging you, please don't do this. Oh, God.
translation.es: Se lo ruego, por favor, no lo haga. Dios.

translation.en: Please, I can't. No, no, no--
Sick and tired of this shit.
translation.es: Cansada y harta de esta mierda.

translation.en: Look, I ain't got no problem.
I'm just out here looking for plates, that's all.
translation.es: Solo ando aquí buscando platos. Eso es todo.

translation.en: Does your kid eat people, too?
I'm just trying to live out here. Same as you.
translation.es: Solo trato de sobrevivir. Igual que tú.

translation.en: Tell me what you want and I'll do it.
translation.es: Dime qué quieres y lo haré.

translation.en: So, tell me what you want me to do
- and I'll do it-- - Shut up.
- Just tell me what you want me-- - There's fucking nothing you can do.
translation.es: - Dime qué quieres... - No puedes hacer una mierda.

translation.en: You want me to take your socks off?
Look, no one cares about you now.
translation.es: Mira, no le importas a nadie.

translation.en: I could've just left you out there in the desert.
translation.es: Pude haberte dejado en el desierto.

translation.en: Is that where you want to be?
Now, you like this bunny, don't you?
Do you want to keep him?
Then you got to do exactly what I say.
translation.es: Entonces, haz exactamente lo que digo.

translation.en: There was a kid was with her.
You better start talking, old man.
A little bit more down here.
Everybody make some noise for the one and only,
translation.es: Hagan mucho ruido para el original, para el único,

translation.en: Come on! The Dream! Come on!
- We love you! - I love you, too.
Fill my life with the Dream!
translation.es: Ha sido toda mi vida, ¡es el Sueño!

translation.en: I've been looking for you all my life!
Why are we out here? Just what are we doing
in the middle of the goddamn desert tonight?
translation.es: ¿Qué hacemos hoy en el medio del puto desierto?

translation.en: You want that music only Jimmy can make.
Let me tell you something about Jimmy.

translation.es: Miembro no funcional de la sociedad.
Eso fue lo que me dijeron.

translation.en: This here is the Bad Batch.
Now, there's only one rule here.
- It's time to find the Dream. - The Dream!
translation.es: - Es hora de encontrar el Sueño. - ¡El Sueño!

translation.en: Where is she? She was just here.
She was right here a second ago.
She was right here a second ago. She's gotta be here.
She's got to be here somewhere.
She's gotta be here. I know she's gotta be here.
translation.es: Debe estar aquí. Sé que debe estar aquí.

translation.en: She's gotta be here somewhere. Where is she?
translation.es: Debe estar aquí en algún lugar. ¿Dónde?

translation.en: What did I do? What did I do?
Hey, you guys seen a little girl?
What am I going to do now?
What is this? What is this place?
This place... What is this place?
Go somewhere. Here's what you do.
Go far away. You go far away.

translation.es: En algún lado. En cualquier sitio.

translation.en: Is that what it always looks like?
It doesn't always look like that.
Thought it was pretty at first, but...
translation.es: Primero pensé que era bonito, pero...

translation.en: I don't even really know what it is.
translation.es: En realidad no sé qué es.

translation.en: in the darkest corner of this Earth...
translation.es: en el rincón más oscuro de esta Tierra.

translation.en: and we're afraid of our own kind.
translation.es: Le tememos a nuestra propia especie.

translation.en: You are a long way from Comfort.
You see a kid look like that?
I'm going to take you to Comfort.
translation.es: Te voy a llevar a Confort.

translation.en: And you will go inside and find her for me.
translation.es: Y entrarás y la buscarás por mí.

translation.en: or nobody except that little girl.
But I'm going to kill you if you don't find her for me.
translation.es: Pero te voy a matar si no la encuentras por mí.

translation.en: We've got guns at the wall. They'll shoot if they see you.
translation.es: Tenemos armas en la pared. Te dispararán si te ven.

translation.en: What if I can't find her?

translation.es: Te la cambio por esa pierna.

translation.en: I can just keep it all for myself.
No, no, no, no, no, no!
How come you're in the Bad Batch?
I am born here, in Havana.
translation.es: Y nací aquí, en la Habana.

translation.en: I come with a boat to America when I was 16.
translation.es: Llegué en un bote a Estados Unidos cuando tenía 16.

translation.en: Like, what did you do in Miami?
I do this, that. No big deal.
I got this one when I was 13.
It's from the first boy I ever loved.
translation.es: Es del primer chico que amé.

translation.en: We both got matching ones at the same time.
translation.es: Nos hicimos tatuajes iguales al mismo tiempo.

translation.en: You don't see things how they are.
translation.es: No ves las cosas como son.

translation.en: You only see things how you are. I don't care.
translation.es: - Solo ves las cosas por como eres. - No me importa.
Eso no cambia nada para mí.
Eso no cambia nada para ti.

translation.en: Let's go. I'm getting out of here.
translation.es: Vamos. Yo me voy a la mierda.

translation.en: Come on. Hurry the fuck up.
Been out in the desert two days, man. I need some food.
translation.es: Estuve dos días en el desierto. Necesito comida.

translation.en: - You guys gonna help me out or what? - What's up with the white girl, man?
translation.es: ¿Van a ayudarme o qué? ¿Qué hay de la blanca?

translation.en: Found her ass out there with one of them bridge people.
translation.es: La encontré afuera con uno de los del Puente.

translation.en: ♪ Called out into the cold night ♪
Excuse me. Have you seen this kid?
- Have you seen this kid anywhere? - Mnh- mnh.
translation.es: ¿Ha visto a esta niña por ahí?

translation.en: Can you look out for her, please?
translation.es: ¿Podría fijarse a ver si la ve?

translation.en: Hey, have you guys seen a little girl?

translation.es: No he visto ni mierda, chica.

translation.en: I wish they'd stop making pennies.
- Hey. - I don't want to be a loser. I want to be a finder.
translation.es: No quiero ser perdedor. Quiero ser explorador.

translation.en: Finder finds things, loser loses them.
translation.es: El explorador encuentra, el perdedor pierde.

translation.en: Yeah, I need to find a kid.
translation.es: Yo debo encontrar a una niña.
- Es como de esta altura. - Sí.

translation.en: - Where? - Hey, you want to play with my puzzle?
No, I'm not going to play with your puzzle.
translation.es: No, no voy a jugar a tu rompecabezas.

translation.en: - Thank you. - I'll call you later.
That's the economy of Comfort sitting right in front of you.
translation.es: Es la economía de Confort justo frente a ti.

translation.en: They say you can catch more flies with honey.
translation.es: Dicen que atrapas más moscas con miel.

translation.en: Remind me your name again, sweetheart.
Let me ask you a question, Arlen.
When you shit here in Comfort,
Because, uh, the toilet takes it someplace.
translation.es: ¿Porque el baño se la lleva a alguna otra parte?

translation.en: It takes it where it takes it.
translation.es: La lleva a donde la lleva.
de que mis hijos y mis hijas

translation.en: would have to stew in their own shit.
translation.es: tengan que revolcarse en su mierda.
Las vacas se paran en su mierda.
Los cerdos se paran en su mierda

translation.en: Some misbehaving humans have been making hamburgers out

translation.es: con mis hijos y mis hijas.

translation.en: We don't stand in our shit.
translation.es: No nos paramos en nuestra mierda.

translation.en: is because I won't let that happen.
I got each and every toilet in Comfort taking that shit
translation.es: Hago que todos los baños de Confort se lleven esa mierda

translation.en: and sending it down the pipes
translation.es: y la envíen por las tuberías

translation.en: till it reaches a place where no one thinks about it.
translation.es: hasta llegar a un lugar donde nadie piense en ella

translation.en: But you don't like it here,
translation.es: Pero a ti no te gusta,

translation.en: It costs a lot to be here.
It cost you an arm and a leg.
translation.es: Te costó un brazo y una pierna.

translation.en: You know what I see when I look at you?
translation.es: ¿Sabes lo que veo cuando te veo?

translation.en: A sailboat out on the sea.
What is it you want, Arlen?
If you could have one thing...
translation.es: Si pudieras tener solo una cosa,
Todas las cosas que has hecho

translation.en: I want to be the solution for something.
translation.es: Quiero ser la solución de algo.

translation.en: You take care of a garden
and it takes care of you back.
Few things in this world operate like that.
translation.es: Pocas cosas en este mundo operan de esa forma.

translation.en: It just needs a place to grow.
translation.es: Solo necesita un lugar para crecer.

translation.en: and it's part of the world.
Because you know what the Dream really is?
translation.es: ¿Porque sabes lo que es realmente el Sueño?

translation.en: Make up a room for our guest.
I guess I'm just a bit nervous.
Can you come in for a second?
You want to see it all over your fucking walls?
You take care of this rabbit.
When we're out and clear of the wall, I'll let her go.
translation.es: Cuando hayamos salido sin problemas,  la dejaré ir.

translation.en: I'm real disappointed in you, Arlen.
translation.es: Estoy muy decepcionado de ti, Arlen.

translation.en: Once we're out, I'll let her go. I swear.
translation.es: Cuando salgamos, la dejaré ir. Lo juro.

translation.en: Check this shit out right here, homes.
- Open it, Nacho. - Open the gate, homes.
translation.es: - Abre, Nacho. - Abre la reja, viejo.

translation.en: Don't come back, you crazy bitch.
What are you doing right now?
Do you want to hang out or something?
What you think I am, gringa?
What if all these things that happened to us happened to us
translation.es: ¿Y si todas las cosas que nos pasaron, nos pasaron

translation.en: so the next things that are gonna happen to us... can happen to us?
translation.es: para que lo siguiente que nos pase efectivamente pueda pasarnos?

translation.en: In this place, it's only death for you.
translation.es: En este lugar solo habrá muerte para ti.

translation.en: I want spaghetti because the other man gave me spaghetti.
translation.es: Quiero espagueti porque el otro hombre me dio espagueti.
